烵字的基本解释

烵
zhuó
〔烵烁〕草木花色鲜艳的样子。

烵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《集韻》職略切，入藥，章。］
见“烵爍”。

烵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　烵； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页671第17
【集韻】【類篇】?職略切，音酌，烵爍。草木花色盛貌。　【正字通】俗灼字。字彙誤分爲二。◎按字彙本之集韻類篇也。灼字義甚多，玉篇亦有花盛一義，似可與烵通，然其他義固與。烵無與正字通以烵爲俗灼字，而駁字彙之誤分，非是。

烵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
烵字的起名意思

草木花色鲜艳的样子，如烵烁。

烵

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　烵; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 671-17
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Careers are slightly cut, the sound is determined, and the Shuo Shuo. Plants and trees are gorgeous.　【Zhengzitong】Commonly burnt characters. The vocabulary is incorrectly divided into two. ◎ The rhyme chapters of the vocabulary book. Zhuozi has many meanings, and the jade chapter also has the same meaning as Huasheng, which seems to be connected with 烵, but other meanings are solid.烵无和正字 always use 烵 as a popular word, but the misclassification of refuting the word is not true.
